content: I had some issue opening the app, it turned out the app on the store changed (older app got removed, but new app retained the Purchased flag). App would just shut itself when I opened it. The store told me there was an update but download failed (because it tried to download the old app). Solution: Uninstall the old app, restart Google Play store if it still bugs out, then install the new app. You need to readd your Mastodon accounts, reenter your credentials, but it should work fine then.
